title: Revenge Interrupted
features: Savannah has a history she is determined to forget. She has a career, and is living the American dream; a far cry from her childhood. As she moves beyond the sting of her past, a sequence of events that are more than just coincidence assists destiny in unveiling everything good and bad. The worst has happened when her past comes back to haunt her in more ways than one, and the best has happened—love has finally called her by name. As the truth comes to light, she struggles with the comfort of her past—Benji, due to fear of her future—Langston Carter. Past decisions lead her to her long-lost sister through the ultimate act of betrayal. Will her family be reunited in spite of it all? In the midst of all the chaos, she finds herself face-to-face with the one man who started the domino effect of negativity in her life. Nothing is coincidence in this rags-to-riches tale of karma, forgiveness and redemption with a twist of drama. Will everyone get their just desserts or will Revenge be Interrupted?
description: T.L. Tucker was born in Washington, DC. She resided in PG County all of her life. T.L. knew at a young age that writing was her passion inspiring in her senior yearbook to be a journalist. T.L. is single with two beautiful children, Sabrina and Reginald. In 2008 she released her first book, "Single & Saved in PG County," a self-help auto biography about dating, singleness, single parenting, and divorce. She has stepped out of the box with her new fictional novel Revenge Interrupted, setting a new standard for real literature. She has also produced and directed her first short film also titled, Revenge Interrupted based off of her novel. As an author and film maker her goal is to challenge society and plant the seeds of righteousness, integrity, and morals while entertaining them with her unique style of writing.
store: T. L. Tucker (Author),  Paul W. Conant (Editor),  Dr. Cassandra Logan Phd. (Editor),  Warren Sims (Photographer)
